A Visit to the Arab Museum of Modern Art and Participation in the Competition
8  May,  2024
Participants from the Citizen Chapter visited the Arab Museum of Modern Art to explore the displayed paintings, raise awareness of art, and learn about Qatari artistic heritage, customs, and essential heritage landmarks. They were also allowed to participate in an awareness competition related to the artworks exhibited in the museum.
